Meteor.Graphics.Sprites

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.Graphics.Sprites.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    An animation is a series of Bitmaps played in a timed sequence.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.LinkedList<Meteor.Graphics.Sprites.Animation.Frame> frames
      Number of frames in the action

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation()
      Creates an empty animation.
      Animation(Bitmap[] animation, int duration)
      Creates an animation, assigning all frames with a single delay time.

      Creates an animation, assigning each frame with a delay time.

    • Field Detail

      • frames

        public java.util.LinkedList<Meteor.Graphics.Sprites.Animation.Frame> frames
        Number of frames in the action

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation()
        Creates an empty animation.

      • Animation

        public Animation(Bitmap[] animation,
                 int[] duration)
        Creates an animation, assigning each frame with a delay time. The delay times must be the same size as the number of frames.
        Parameters:
        animation - Series of frames to be played in order.
        duration - Duration in seconds for each frame.

      • Animation

        public Animation(Bitmap[] animation,
                 int duration)
        Creates an animation, assigning all frames with a single delay time.
        Parameters:
        animation - Series of frames to be played in order.
        duration - Duration in seconds for each frame.

    • Method Detail

      • addFrame

        public Animation addFrame(Bitmap bitmap,
                          int duration)
        Adds a new frame to the end of the action list
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap to be drawn.
        duration - Duration in seconds of the frame.
        Returns:
        A new frame to the end of the action list.

      • render

        public void render(Context ctx,
                   int x,
                   int y)
        Renders the action on a given context.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Render context to be drawn on.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.

      • render

        public void render(Context ctx,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   float alpha)
        Renders the action on a given context with specified transparency.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Render context to be drawn on.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        alpha - Alpha transparency of the action.

      • render

        public void render(Context ctx,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   float alpha,
                   int tint)
        Renders the action on a given context with specified transparency and tint color.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Render context to be drawn on.
        x - x-coordinate on screen.
        y - y-coordinate on screen.
        alpha - Alpha transparency of the action.
        tint - Tint color of the action.

      • getBitmap

        public Bitmap getBitmap()
        Returns:
        The bitmap of the current frame.

      • flipFrames

        public void flipFrames(boolean horizontal,
                       boolean vertical)
        Flips all frames within the animation on one or more axis.
        Parameters:
        horizontal - Flip all frames according to a horizontal axis.
        vertical - Flip all frames according to a vertical axis.

      • getMirror

        public Bitmap getMirror(boolean horizontal,
                        boolean vertical)
        Grabs the mirrored/flipped version of the current frame on one or more axis.
        Parameters:
        horizontal - Flip all frames according to a horizontal axis.
        vertical - Flip all frames according to a vertical axis.
        Returns:
        The mirrored version of the current frame.

      • getMirror

        public Bitmap getMirror()
        Grabs the mirrored/flipped version of the current frame on the vertical axis.
        Returns:
        The mirrored version of the current frame.

      • getSpeed

        public float getSpeed()
        Supplies the play speed of the animation. 1f means normal speed, while 0.5f denotes half speed and 2.0f denotes 2x speed.
        Returns:
        Play speed of the animation.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(float speed)
        Changes the animation play speed. 1.0f is 1x speed.
        Parameters:
        speed - Play speed of the animation.

      • isLooping

        public boolean isLooping()
        Supplies the flag that denotes if the animation loops after finished playing.
        Returns:
        Whether if animation loops after stopped playing.

      • setLooping

        public void setLooping(boolean looping)
        Sets whether the animation will loop after finished playing once.
        Parameters:
        looping - Whether animation loops after stopped playing once.

      • isReverseMode

        public boolean isReverseMode()
        Supplies whether the animation plays backwards.
        Returns:
        Whether if animation plays backwards.

      • setReverseMode

        public void setReverseMode(boolean reverseMode)
        Sets whether animation will play backwards.
        Parameters:
        reverseMode - Flag that denotes backwards animation.

      • isPingpongMode

        public boolean isPingpongMode()
        Determines whether the animation is in ping-pong mode. Ping-pong mode animations will alter between reverse animation and normal animation each time after completing the animation sequence.
        Returns:
        Whether animation is in ping pong mode.

      • setPingpongMode

        public void setPingpongMode(boolean pingpongMode)
        Sets whether animation will play in ping-pong mode.
        Parameters:
        pingpongMode - Flag that denotes ping-pong mode.

      • start

        public void start()
        Begin playing action.

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Resets action timer to current time and frame to 0. Plays the action again if stopped.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops playing action.

      • hasStopped

        public boolean hasStopped()
        Supplies the play state of the animation.
        Returns:
        Play state of the animation.

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scale)
        Method used to scale each frame of the animation.
        Parameters:
        scale - Scaling ratio.
